comments:
build 20020205

I currently get a null pointer exception when I attempt to Check In a Project 
that has conflicts with the server

STEPS
1) Find a project that has conflicts with the server
2) Select Synchonize with Repository
3) Select the Outgoing Changes
4) Choose to Check In despite the errors

Exception

4 org.eclipse.team.cvs.ui 1 Internal error
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Add.commandFinished
(Add.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.execute
(Command.java:368)
	at org.eclipse.team.ccvs.core.CVSTeamProvider.add
(CVSTeamProvider.java:258)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.RepositoryManager.add
(RepositoryManager.java:397)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CommitMergeAction.run
(CommitMergeAction.java:127)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.MergeAction$1.execute
(MergeAction.java:98)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run
(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:64)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run
(Workspace.java:1232)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run
(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:78)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:98)

I suspect the error was related to the cause of bug 9189. NPE has been changed 
to a more meaningful exception.
